a large plate used for serving food, or a meal with one type of food served on a large plate: a fish platter The waiter came out carrying a huge platter of fruit.
Claudia Totir/Moment/GettyImages
computing
  specialized a disk in a computer that holds information and spins around: A computer hard disk drive may have multiple platters.
